HOME.TITLE: What is Flexi UI?
HOME.DESCRIPTION: Flexi UI is an Angular UI library that offers a variety of powerful UI components available for free. It aims to provide the essential components you need to design modern and impressive frontends. You can also contribute to the project by supporting the codebase or sharing your suggestions and feedback to help it grow.
